titleStmt.title: A sermon prerched [sic] by Mr. James Row, sometime minister at Strowan, in St. Geilles Kirk at Edinburgh, which has been commonly known by the name of Pockmanty preaching.
titleStmt.author: Row, James, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
